name: Al-Kharafi Investment & Capital Plat-Form
overview: Al-Kharafi Investment & Capital is an investment & Capital company that started in Kuwait initially and then expanded abroad. As a general guideline, we seek to disburse sufficient funds for project to individuals to actualize/ harness their potentials, on its own or with investment partners, to have a significant capital in operation of that company. In determining whether to invest in an individual, specific obligations must be met. We consider quality of management, return on investment, growth potential, projected cash flow, investment size and financing and reputable investment partners.
